welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Monte Mor, Brazil! Prepare to be enchanted by our charming city, known for its beautiful landscapes and friendly locals. We invite you to explore and enjoy all that Monte Mor has to offer."

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Viracopos Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal used for domestic flights only.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal used for regional flights at Campo dos Amarais–Prefeito Francisco Amaral State Airport.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
